org.cloudbus.cloudsim
Class VmSchedulerTimeShared

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmScheduler
      org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmSchedulerTimeShared

public class VmSchedulerTimeShared
extends VmScheduler

VmSchedulerTimeShared is a VMM allocation policy that allocates one or more Pe to a VM, and allows sharing of PEs by multiple VMs. This class also implements 10% performance degration due to VM migration.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
Author:
Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov

getMaxAvailableMips

public double getMaxAvailableMips()
Returns maximum available MIPS among all the PEs. For the time shared policy it is just all the avaiable MIPS.
